column1:
ප්‍ර
 :  රාජය ල  සිටි ආරක්ෂක නිළදාරියා සම  ඔබ වකාපමන දුරක් පැමිණියාද?
I  observe  that  the  Employee,  in  the  course  of  the  cross  examination  of  the  Security
Manager Ukwatte Hewage Dayawansha Dharmapriya, had focused only to establish that
this witness was giving evidence on what he was told by the Chief Security Officer Ajith
Kumara Rathnayake as he had not seen the incident.
The charges framed by the Employer against the Employee are as follows:
